Deutsch: Han Shu, Geschichtswerk über die Han (Eig, Werk, Autor: Ban Biao)
English: History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories `二十四史~[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu `班固~[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls
